title: MD
biography: Prathap Chandra Reddy is an Indian entrepreneur and cardiologist who founded the first corporate chain of hospitals in India, the Apollo Hospitals. India Today ranked him 48th in its 2017 list of India's 50 most powerful people.
aiSummary: Prathap C. Reddy is a health systems specialist with an H-index of 110 at Apollo Hospitals (Faculty). Has been published in Nature nanotechnology, Cell, JAMA otolaryngology-- head & neck surgery. Based in India.
